job_details.Functieomschrijving:
F&R Emerging Technologies is a team that uses AI to develop innovative solutions for various teams in the ING group. Our team is located in Amsterdam. We have both continuous learning and continuous improvement embedded in our sprint rhythm. Helping each other and honing hands-on skills are core values of the team. We believe that Artificial Intelligence is a key differentiator for improving products and services for our customers, but also we see opportunity to significantly optimize ING employee experiences using AI
       Roles & Responsibilities
       Responsible for the research and implementation of core algorithms various AI project including NLP, GenAI, timeseries forecasting and anomaly detection.
       Keep up with the latest technology research and breakthroughs in the field of natural language processing, Deep Learning and knowledge graphs.
       Participate in the training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses.
       Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms. Responsible for selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

F&R Emerging Technologies is a team that uses AI to develop innovative solutions for various teams in the ING group. Our team is located in Amsterdam. We have both continuous learning and continuous improvement embedded in our sprint rhythm. Helping each other and honing hands-on skills are core values of the team. We believe that Artificial Intelligence is a key differentiator for improving products and services for our customers, but also we see opportunity to significantly optimize ING employee experiences using AI
       Roles & Responsibilities
       Responsible for the research and implementation of core algorithms various AI project including NLP, GenAI, timeseries forecasting and anomaly detection.
       Keep up with the latest technology research and breakthroughs in the field of natural language processing, Deep Learning and knowledge graphs.
       Participate in the training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses.
       Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms. Responsible for selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes Generative AI (GenAI), including fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) with techniques like RLHF, optimizing model generation effects, and reducing harmful responses. It also mentions NLP and exploring cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in this domain. While time series forecasting and anomaly detection are mentioned, the core focus and specific techniques described align more closely with the responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and optimizing generative models and their applications.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'research and implementation of core algorithms various AI project including NLP, GenAI, timeseries forecasting and anomaly detection.' It also details 'training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses.' Furthermore, it states 'Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms.'
job_tasks.phrase: research and implementation of core algorithms various AI project including NLP, GenAI, timeseries forecasting and anomaly detection

job_tasks.justification: The description details 'training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses.'
job_tasks.phrase: training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms.'
job_tasks.phrase: Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Responsible for selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions.' This implies building and integrating solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data' suggests a need to understand and process data for model improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data
